## Objectives

\begin{itemize}
\item Estimate metrics such as:
    \begin{itemize}
    \item[-] distribution,
    \item[-] abundance,
    \item[-] population trend and,
    \item[-] species diversity.
    \end{itemize}
\item Integrate these metrics for different populations.
\item Model observation error.
\end{itemize}


## State-space models

\begin{itemize}

    \item Account for observation error.
\end{itemize}
